p: After 4 days of storage, the vegetable mixture quality deteriorated ( Figure 3B). Vegetable samples treated with EO mixtures were rated better than EOs alone. The control sample and the sample treated with the SOO + SMO mixture at a ¼ MIC + ¼ MIC combination differed the least. Both samples obtained the highest scores, with overall quality of 7.00 and 7.25, respectively.
